 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=arrow.class)
public class HadoopFileSystem
extends IOFileSystem

      • GetWorkingDirectory

        @ByVal
public Status GetWorkingDirectory(@StdString @Cast(value={"char*","std::string*"})
                                          BytePointer out)
        Return the filesystem's current working directory. The working directory is the base path for all relative paths given to other APIs. NOTE: this actually returns a URI.

        path - file path to change
        owner - pass null for no change
